name: CommercialCriteriaRule
comment: Maintains valid commercial criteria rules.Example of rules include:1. Geographical - indicates where the offer can be sold.2. Sales Channel - indicates who can sell it. 3. Serviceability - indicates where the offer is available.4. Eligibility - indicates who is eligible to buy the offer. Each rule type populates different set of fields, hence some of the fields will be empty.
vf short description: Maintains valid commercial criteria rules.Example of rules include:1. Geographical - indicates where the offer can be sold.2. Sales Channel - indicates who can sell it. 3. Serviceability - indicates where the offer is available.4.

fields.name: CommercialCriteriaRuleSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: CommercialCriteriaRuleKey
fields.comment: Uniquely identifies commercial criteria rules such as,- Geographical - where the offer can be sold - Sales Channel - who can sell it - Serviceability - where the offer is available - eligibility - who is eligible to by the offer. Each type populates different fields. Therefore for each type, some of the fields will be empty.

fields.name: CommercialCriteriaRuleId
fields.comment: Natural ID for the different rules.

fields.name: CommercialCriteriaRuleTypeInd
fields.comment: Identifies the rule type.Values are:- E=Eligibility- C=Sales Channel- S=Serviceability- G=Geographical

fields.name: EligibilityGroupId
fields.comment: Indicates the group to which a rule belongs. The group will be populated for eligibilty rules only.

fields.name: EligibilityGroupOrder
fields.comment: Indicates the priority of a rule, within the set of rules, belonging to the same item. Commercial Criteria rules will be populated for eligibilty rules only.

fields.name: CommercialCriteriaRuleName
fields.comment: Indicates the name for a group of rules. Commercial Criteria rules will be populated for eligibilty rules only.

fields.name: ProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CommercialCriteriaRuleDesc
fields.comment: Indicates the description of the rule. Only eligibilty rules will be populated .

fields.name: SalesChannelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: EffectiveDate
fields.comment: Indicates the effective date of the rule.

fields.name: ExpiryDate
fields.comment: Indicates the expiry date of the rule.

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
